name: Avoid! (itch)
description:
Your objective is simple: Avoid the white square! There are pick-ups to help along the way. The longer you survive, the higher your score goes. You can choose from 4 difficulty levels to play at: Easy, Normal, Hard, and Impossible.

Controls:

-- WASD / Arrow Keys - Move, change selected menu item

-- Space / Enter - Perform selected menu item's action

-- Escape - Pause game
